name: DIVE (itch) (spiralbits)
description:
Game undersea adventure starring a diver and inspired by the classic game of the CPC computers,"Titanic" only this must ocasion find a total of 5 shipwrecks, but your supply harpoons to attack enemies and oxygen are limited so you should look for oxygen bottles and boxes of ammunition, we provide kits that will make you regain health.

Developed for PC Windows and Android

In the Windows version we can play with the directional keypad using the spacebar to shoot and backspace to go and record.

Android version game for Mobile and Tablets incorporates an on-screen cursor and directional button to shoot the harpoon, which make it playable, the game includes ability to save your progress and a quiet.

Original tune that will accompany you throughout the game.
